subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: On his long watch, Juan Antonio Samaranch presided over the transformation of the I.O.C. from an elite and musty club of white men into a more relevant, representative and powerful organization.
snippet: On his long watch, Juan Antonio Samaranch presided over the transformation of the I.O.C. from an elite and musty club of white men into a more relevant, representative and powerful organization.
